Package com.hoodiecoder.enchantmentcore.utils

Class EnchantmentUtils

java.lang.Object
com.hoodiecoder.enchantmentcore.utils.EnchantmentUtils
public class EnchantmentUtils extends Object
Utility class containing several useful methods for using the plugin, as well as manipulating and working with enchantments.

    • getRomanNumeral

      public static String getRomanNumeral​(int num)
      Returns the roman numeral for the specified integer.
      Parameters:
      num - The number to convert
      Returns:
      Roman numeral for numbers 1-10; otherwise, it will return the integer as a String.

    • parseRomanNumeral

      public static int parseRomanNumeral​(String num)
      Returns the integer value of the specified roman numeral 1-10.
      Parameters:
      num - The roman numeral to convert
      Returns:
      Integer value of roman numeral for numbers 1-10. If num is instead a numeric String, it will return the integer value of that String; otherwise, it will return -1.

    • getEnchCode

      public static String getEnchCode()
      Gets the enchantment code applied at the end of every enchantment lore line.
      Returns:
      Enchantment lore code

    • parseLore

      public static Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> parseLore​(List<String> lore)
      Parses a list containing item lore into its respective enchantments and levels.
      Parameters:
      lore - The lore to parse
      Returns:
      Map of enchantments and their levels based on the lore

    • createLore

      public static List<String> createLore​(Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> enchs, List<String> currentLore)
      Creates item lore for enchantments and their levels based on current item lore.
      Parameters:
      enchs - The enchantments and levels to add
      currentLore - Current item lore to combine with
      Returns:
      Lore created from the given enchantments

    • createLoreLine

      public static String createLoreLine​(CustomEnch ce, int lvl)
      Creates a single line of lore for a custom enchantment.
      Parameters:
      ce - The custom enchantment
      lvl - The level of the enchantment
      Returns:
      Lore line for the enchantment

    • parseLoreLine

      public static Map.Entry<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> parseLoreLine​(String s)
      Parses a single line of lore into an enchantment and its level.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to parse
      Returns:
      Parsed enchantment and its level; null if no enchantment could be extracted.

      Gets the rarity of the specified enchantment.
      Parameters:
      ench - The enchantment to test
      Returns:
      Rarity of the enchantment; null if the enchantment is unknown.

    • addEnchantments

      public static void addEnchantments​(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta meta, Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> enchs, boolean ignoreLevelRestriction)
      Adds the specified map of enchantments to the specified item meta.
      Parameters:
      meta - The meta to add to
      enchs - The map of enchantments to add
      ignoreLevelRestriction - Indicates that level restriction on enchantments should be ignored

    • getGenerator

      public static EnchantmentGenerator getGenerator()
      Retrieves the EnchantmentGenerator for the current plugin instance.
      Returns:
      The current EnchantmentGenerator

    • combineEnchants

      @SafeVarargs public static Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> combineEnchants​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemToEnchant, boolean allowIllegal, Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer>... maps)
      Combines multiple maps of enchantments for the specified item.
      Parameters:
      itemToEnchant - The item to combine enchantments for
      allowIllegal - Indicates that incompatible or conflicting enchantments can be combined and added
      maps - Array of multiple maps to combine
      Returns:
      Combined map of enchantments

    • getValidSacrificeEnchants

      public static Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> getValidSacrificeEnchants​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemToEnchant, boolean allowIllegal, Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> target, Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> sacrifice)
      Returns all valid sacrifice enchantments for anvil combinations for the given item.
      Parameters:
      itemToEnchant - The result item of the anvil
      allowIllegal - Indicates that incompatible or illegal enchantments are valid
      target - The map of all enchantments on the first item in the anvil
      sacrifice - The map of all enchantments on the second item in the anvil
      Returns:
      Map of all valid enchantments on the second item in the anvil

    • getRepairAmount

      public static int getRepairAmount​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack target, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)

      Gets the durability amount that can be repaired given a tiered item and a stack of its repair material.

      For example, the tiered item type IRON_PICKAXE has the repair material IRON_INGOT.

      Parameters:
      target - The tiered item to be tested
      item - The stack of the target's repair material
      Returns:
      The amount of durability that can be repaired with the given repair material

    • getUnitRepairNumber

      public static int getUnitRepairNumber​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack target, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Gets the number of times a tiered item can be repaired before its durability is full.
      Parameters:
      target - The tiered item to be tested
      item - The stack of the target's repair material
      Returns:
      The number of times the durability can be repaired with the given repair material

      item - The item to test
      Returns:

      num - Number to set to
      Returns:
